crystallize.translation[0].definitions[0: if a liquid crystallizes, it forms crystals
The liquid will crystallize at 50 degrees centigrade.
crystallize.translation[0].definitions[1: if an idea, plan etc crystallizes or is crystallized, it becomes very clear in your mind
Inside her a thought was crystallizing.
crystallize.translation[1].definitions[0: to obtain or lose an amount of money
The failure of the shipping company would have crystallized large losses and put the bankâ€™s survival in doubt.
